metadata.title: CVE-2023-52674 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:ALSA: scarlett2: Add clamp() in scarlett2_mixer_ctl_put()Ensure the value passed to scarlett2_mixer_ctl_put() is between 0 andSCARLETT2_MIXER_MAX_VALUE so we don't attempt to access outsidescarlett2_mixer_values[].

criterions.comment: linux package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
